snippet: The agenda will be based on the complaints restaurateurs make in an online survey by the Council.
abstract: The agenda will be based on the complaints restaurateurs make in an online survey by the Council.
lead_paragraph: In response to restaurateurs' complaints about the city's 18-month-old letter-grading system, the City Council announced Tuesday that it will hold hearings on the inspection process in late February.

headline.main: City Council to Hold Hearing on Restaurant Inspection Complaints
